Verses: 1 EN SAGODHARARE, ADHIGA AAKKINAIYAI ADAIVOM ENDRU ARINDHU, UNGALIL ANEGAR PODHAGARAAGAADHIRUPPEERGALAAGA.
2 NAAM ELLAARUM ANEGA VISHAYANGALIL THAVARUGIROM; ORUVAN SOLDHAVARAADHAVANAANAAL AVAN POORANAPURUSHANUM, THAN SAREERAMUZHUVADHAIYUM KADIVAALATHTHINAALE ADAKKIKKOLLAKKOODIYAVANUMAAYIRUKKIRAAN.
3 PAARUNGAL, KUDHIRAIGAL NAMAKKU KEEZHPPADIYUMPADIKKU AVAIGALIN VAAIGALIL KADIVAALAMPOTTU, AVAIGALUDAIYA MUZHUCHCHAREERATHTHAIYUM THIRUPPI NATADHTHUGIROM.

4 KAPPALGALAIYUM PAARUNGAL, AVAIGAL MAGAA PERIYAVAIGALAAYIRUNDHAALUM, KADUNGAATRUGALAAL ADIPATTAALUM, AVAIGALAI NADATHTHUGIRAVAN POGUMPADI YOSIKKUM IDAM EDHUVO AVVIDATHTHIRKU NERAAGA MIGAVUM SIRIDHAANA SUKKAANAALE THIRUPPAPPADUM.
5 APPADIYE, NAAVAANADHUM SIRIYA AVAYAVAMAAYIRUNDHUM PERUMAIYAANAVAIGALAI PESUM. PAARUNGAL, SIRIYA NERUPPU EVVALAVU PERIYA KAATTAI KOLUTHTHIVIDUGIRADHU!

6 NAAVUM NERUPPUTHTHAAN, ADHU ANEEDHI NIRAINDHA ULAGAM; NAMMUDAIYA AVAYAVANGALIL NAAVAANADHU MUZHUCHCHAREERATHTHAIYUM KARAIPPADUTHTHI, AAYUL SAKKARATHTHA KOLUTHTHIVIDUGIRADHAAYUM, NARAGA AKKINIYINAAL KOLUTHTHAPPADUGIRADHAAYUM IRUKKIRADHU!
7 SAGALAVIDHAMAANA MIRUGANGAL, PARAVAIGAL, OORUMPIRAANIGAL, NEERVAAZHUM JENDHUKKAL AAGIYA IVAIGALIN SUBAAVAM MANUSHASUBAAVATHTHAAL ADAKKAPPADUM, ADAKKAPPATTADHUMUNDU.
8 NAAVAI ADAKKA ORU MANUSHANAALUM KOODAADHU; ADHU ADANGAADHA POLLAANGULLADHUM SAAVUKKEDHUVAANA VISHAM NIRAINDHADHUMAAYIRUKKIRADHU.
9 ADHINAALE NAAM PIDHAAVAAGIYA DHEVANAI THUDHIKKIROM; DHEVANUDAIYA SAAYALINPADI UNDAAKKAPPATTA MANUSHARAI ADHINAALEYE SABIKKIROM.
10 THUDHITHTHALUM SABITHTHALUM OREVAAYILIRUNDHU PURAPPADUGIRADHU. EN SAGODHARARE, IPPADIYIRUKKALAAGAADHU.
11 ORE OOTRUKKANNILIRUNDHU THITHTHIPPUM KASAPPUMAANA THANNEER SURAKKUMAA?
12 EN SAGODHARARE, ATHTHIMARAM OLIVAPPAZHANGALAIYUM, THIRAATSACHCHEDI ATHTHIPPAZHANGALAIYUM KODUKKUMAA? APPADIYE UVARPPAANA NEEROOTRUTH THITHTHIPPAANA JALATHTHAI KODUKKAMAATTAADHU.
13 UNGALIL GNAANIYUM VIVEGIYUMAAYIRUKKIRAVAN EVANO, AVAN GNAANATHTHIRKURIYA SAANDHATHTHODE THAN KIRIYAIGALAI NALLA NADAKKAIYINAALE KAANBIKKAKKADAVAN.
14 UNGAL IRUDHAYATHTHILE KASAPPAANA VAIRAAKKIYATHTHAIYUM VIRODHATHTHAIYUM VAITHTHEERGALAANAAL, NEENGAL PERUMAIPAARAATTAADHIRUNGAL; SATHTHIYATHTHIRKU VIRODHAMAAI POISOLLAAMALUMIRUNGAL.
15 IPPADIPPATTA GNAANAM PARATHTHILIRUNDHU IRANGIVARUGIRA GNAANAMAAYIRAAMAL, LOWGIGA SAMPANDHAMAANADHUM, JENMASUBAAVATHTHUKKURIYADHUM, PEYTHTHANATHTHUKKADUTHTHADHUMAAYIRUKKIRADHU.
16 VAIRAAKKIYAMUM VIRODHAMUM ENGE UNDO, ANGE KALAKAMUM SAGALA THURCHCHEYGAIGALUMUNDU.

17 PARATHTHILIRUNDHU VARUGIRA GNAANAMO MUDHALAAVADHU SUTHTHAMULLADHAAYUM, PINBU SAMAADHAANAMUM SAANDHAMUM INAKKAMUMULLADHAAYUM, IRAKKATHTHAALUM NARKANIGALAALUM NIRAINDHADHAAYUM, PATCHAPAADHAMILLAADHADHAAYUM, MAAYAMATRADHAAYUMIRUKKIRADHU.
18 NEEDHIYAAGIYA KANIYAANADHU SAMAADHAANATHTHAI NADAPPIKKIRAVARGALAALE SAMAADHAANATHTHILE VIDHAIKKAPPADUGIRADHU.
